proposals.description: Add predictive fitness modeling to the Proposer role. Instead of only analyzing current state, develop ability to simulate potential outcomes of proposals before implementation, reducing wasted cycles on low-impact changes and identifying high-leverage improvements.
proposals.implementation_sketch: Extend Proposer with a lightweight simulation capability that models how proposed changes might affect swarm dynamics. Use historical evolution patterns to predict likelihood of success. Include dharmic impact modeling to ensure proposals align with Akram Vignan principles of right understanding and natural progression.
